name: Gravedigger: A Final Stand
description:
Gravedigger a final stand is a game that revolves around a single hero fending off countless enemies in a post apocalyptic world. The world is shrinking for your hero, Every hit you take will limit your play area. If the play area under your feet disappears, you lose!

Press "W,A,S,D" to move around. Press "LEFT SHIFT" to sprint.
Press "LEFT MOUSE BUTTON" to fire.
Press "RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON" to aim.

Rate our game at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/gravedigger-a-final-stand-1
